description: Change of Use from Hairdressers/Retail (Use Class A1) to Residential (Use Class C3) (1 x 1 bedroom unit)
decision_conditions: The proposed development would result in a poor standard of living space given the proposed floorspace would be below that prescribed as minimum floorspace requirements for a studio-sized flat. The proposals would, therefore, be contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework (2019), Policy 3.5 of the London Plan (2016) and Policy DM10 of the adopted Core Strategy (2012).
